id.kaytrust.core.credential.ethereum.admin

Interface EthereumCredentialIssuer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CredentialIssuer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EthereumCredentialIssuerImpl

    public interface EthereumCredentialIssuer
extends CredentialIssuer
    The generalized interface compliant with any ethereum network that considers the methods to issue a verifiable credential in any ethereum network.
    See Also:
    CredentialIssuer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static EthereumCredentialIssuer instance(String hostRpc, String token, String privateKey, String contractAddressIdentity, String contractAddressCredential)
      Sets an instance to interact with a verification registry smart contract.
      static EthereumCredentialIssuer instance(String hostRpc, String token, String privateKey, String contractAddressIdentity, String contractAddressCredential, int blockTime)
      Sets an instance to interact with a verification registry smart contract.

      • Methods inherited from interface id.kaytrust.core.credential.base.CredentialIssuer

        issueCredential, revoke

    • Method Detail

      • instance

        static EthereumCredentialIssuer instance(String hostRpc,
                                         String token,
                                         String privateKey,
                                         String contractAddressIdentity,
                                         String contractAddressCredential)
                                  throws ParamEmptyException
        Sets an instance to interact with a verification registry smart contract. If the "contractAddress" argument is null a new Verification Registry smart contract is deployed on the ethereum network that is accessed through the "hostRPC".
        Parameters:
        hostRpc - host and port where ethereum node serves RPC requests
        token - can be blank, is token field Authorization
        privateKey - The private key used to interact with the smart contract. In smart contracts it is the msg.sender In this context this private key represents the issuer's private key.
        contractAddressIdentity - contract address corresponding to the Identity Manager contract to connect to. that are to be queried.
        contractAddressCredential - contract address VerifibleCredential
        Returns:
        instance EthereumCredentialIssuer
        Throws:
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.

      • instance

        static EthereumCredentialIssuer instance(String hostRpc,
                                         String token,
                                         String privateKey,
                                         String contractAddressIdentity,
                                         String contractAddressCredential,
                                         int blockTime)
                                  throws ParamEmptyException
        Sets an instance to interact with a verification registry smart contract. If the "contractAddress" argument is null a new Verification Registry smart contract is deployed on the ethereum network that is accessed through the "hostRPC".
        Parameters:
        hostRpc - host and port where ethereum node serves RPC requests
        token - can be blank, is token field Authorization
        privateKey - The private key used to interact with the smart contract. In smart contracts it is the msg.sender In this context this private key represents the issuer's private key.
        contractAddressIdentity - contract address corresponding to the Identity Manager contract to connect to. that are to be queried.
        contractAddressCredential - contract address VerifibleCredential
        blockTime - time mining of block in milliseconds, it's optional by default it's 15000
        Returns:
        instance EthereumCredentialIssuer
        Throws:
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.
